input.sentences: superman decided to take the night off from saving people and started drinking spiked punch .
the party was boring to begin with | as only a few of my friends were fun before they started drinking .
the girls started arriving in their short | tight dresses .
then my crazy friends arrived | some of them even dressed in drag .
the party got so crazy | we ended up having to kick a few people out .
output.sentences: My party really started when a guy dressed like Superman spiked the punch.
Everyone got started in on the party fun.
A few girls dressed up in tight short dresses.
Some of my friends even came dressed in drag.
All in all everyone had a real kick at the party.
